enumeratedValues.name: RSPTYP_d
enumeratedValues.description: Response length 48, check busy after response

enumeratedValues.name: CMDTYP_c
enumeratedValues.description: Suspend CMD52 for writing bus suspend in CCCR

enumeratedValues.name: CMDTYP_b
enumeratedValues.description: Resume CMD52 for writing function select in CCCR

enumeratedValues.name: CMDTYP_a
enumeratedValues.description: Abort CMD12, CMD52 for writing I/O Abort in CCCR

enumeratedValues.name: CIHB_a
enumeratedValues.description: Can issue command using only CMD line

enumeratedValues.name: CDIHB_b
enumeratedValues.description: Can issue command that uses the DATA line

enumeratedValues.name: CDIHB_A
enumeratedValues.description: Cannot issue command that uses the DATA line

enumeratedValues.name: SDSTB_b
enumeratedValues.description: Clock is changing frequency and not stable.

RTR.name: RTR
RTR.description: Re-Tuning Request (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode,and eMMC HS200 mode)

enumeratedValues.name: RTR_B
enumeratedValues.description: Fixed or well tuned sampling clock

enumeratedValues.name: TSCD_B
enumeratedValues.description: Delay cell select change is not finished.

enumeratedValues.name: TSCD_A
enumeratedValues.description: Delay cell select change is finished.

enumeratedValues.name: CINST_a
enumeratedValues.description: Power on reset or no card

enumeratedValues.name: D3CD_B
enumeratedValues.description: DATA3 does not monitor card insertion

enumeratedValues.name: DMASEL_A
enumeratedValues.description: No DMA or simple DMA is selected.

enumeratedValues.name: RWCTL_b
enumeratedValues.description: Disables read wait control and stop SD clock at block gap when SABGREQ field is set

enumeratedValues.name: RWCTL_A
enumeratedValues.description: Enables read wait control and assert read wait without stopping SD clock at block gap when SABGREQ field is set

WECINT.name: WECINT
WECINT.description: Wakeup event enable on card interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: WECINT_A
enumeratedValues.description: Disables wakeup event enable on card interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: WECINT_b
enumeratedValues.description: Enables wakeup event enable on card interrupt

WECINS.name: WECINS
WECINS.description: Wakeup event enable on SD card insertion

enumeratedValues.name: WECINS_b
enumeratedValues.description: Disable wakeup event enable on SD card insertion

enumeratedValues.name: WECINS_A
enumeratedValues.description: Enable wakeup event enable on SD card insertion

WECRM.name: WECRM
WECRM.description: Wakeup event enable on SD card removal

enumeratedValues.name: WECRM_B
enumeratedValues.description: Disables wakeup event enable on SD card removal

enumeratedValues.name: WECRM_A
enumeratedValues.description: Enables wakeup event enable on SD card removal

BURST_LEN_EN.name: BURST_LEN_EN
BURST_LEN_EN.description: BURST length enable for INCR, INCR4 / INCR8 / INCR16, INCR4-WRAP / INCR8-WRAP / INCR16-WRAP

enumeratedValues.name: BURST_A
enumeratedValues.description: Burst length is enabled for INCR.

enumeratedValues.name: EXACT_B
enumeratedValues.description: The block read is exact block read. Host driver does not need to issue abort command to terminate this multi-block read.

enumeratedValues.name: EXACT_A
enumeratedValues.description: The block read is non-exact block read. Host driver needs to issue abort command to terminate this multi-block read.

RTE.name: RTE
RTE.description: Re-tuning event: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode and eMMC HS200 mode)

TP.name: TP
TP.description: Tuning pass:(only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode and eMMC HS200 mode)

TNE.name: TNE
TNE.description: Tuning error: (only for SD3.0 SDR104 mode and eMMC HS200 mode)

CEBESEN.name: CEBESEN
CEBESEN.description: Command end bit error status enable

DEBESEN.name: DEBESEN
DEBESEN.description: Data end bit error status enable

CEBEIEN.name: CEBEIEN
CEBEIEN.description: Command end bit error interrupt enable

DEBEIEN.name: DEBEIEN
DEBEIEN.description: Data end bit error interrupt enable

enumeratedValues.name: AC12CE_a
enumeratedValues.description: CRC error met in Auto CMD12/23 response

enumeratedValues.name: AC12IE_a
enumeratedValues.description: Error, the CMD index in response is not CMD12/23

CNIBAC12E.name: CNIBAC12E
CNIBAC12E.description: Command not issued by Auto CMD12 error

enumeratedValues.name: SMP_CLK_B
enumeratedValues.description: Fixed clock is used to sample data

enumeratedValues.name: SMP_CLK_a
enumeratedValues.description: Tuned clock is used to sample data

RD_BRST_LEN.name: RD_BRST_LEN
RD_BRST_LEN.description: Read burst length due to system restriction, the actual burst length might not exceed 16

WR_BRST_LEN.name: WR_BRST_LEN
WR_BRST_LEN.description: Write burst length due to system restriction, the actual burst length might not exceed 16

EXE_TUNE.name: EXE_TUNE
EXE_TUNE.description: Execute tuning: (Only used for SD3.0, SDR104 mode and eMMC HS200 mode)

enumeratedValues.name: SMPSEL_B
enumeratedValues.description: Fixed clock is used to sample data / cmd

enumeratedValues.name: SMPSEL_a
enumeratedValues.description: Tuned clock is used to sample data / cmd

AUTO_TUNE_EN.name: AUTO_TUNE_EN
AUTO_TUNE_EN.description: Auto tuning enable (Only used for SD3.0, SDR104 mode and and eMMC HS200 mode)

FBCLK_SEL.name: FBCLK_SEL
FBCLK_SEL.description: Feedback clock source selection (Only used for SD3.0, SDR104 mode and eMMC HS200 mode)

enumeratedValues.name: FBCLK_B
enumeratedValues.description: Feedback clock comes from the loopback CLK

enumeratedValues.name: FBCLK_a
enumeratedValues.description: Feedback clock comes from the ipp_card_clk_out

FEVTAC12NE.name: FEVTAC12NE
FEVTAC12NE.description: Force event auto command 12 not executed

FEVTAC12TOE.name: FEVTAC12TOE
FEVTAC12TOE.description: Force event auto command 12 time out error

FEVTAC12CE.name: FEVTAC12CE
FEVTAC12CE.description: Force event auto command 12 CRC error

FEVTAC12EBE.name: FEVTAC12EBE
FEVTAC12EBE.description: Force event Auto Command 12 end bit error

FEVTAC12IE.name: FEVTAC12IE
FEVTAC12IE.description: Force event Auto Command 12 index error

FEVTCNIBAC12E.name: FEVTCNIBAC12E
FEVTCNIBAC12E.description: Force event command not executed by Auto Command 12 error

FEVTCTOE.name: FEVTCTOE
FEVTCTOE.description: Force event command time out error

FEVTCEBE.name: FEVTCEBE
FEVTCEBE.description: Force event command end bit error

FEVTDTOE.name: FEVTDTOE
FEVTDTOE.description: Force event data time out error

FEVTDEBE.name: FEVTDEBE
FEVTDEBE.description: Force event data end bit error

ADMAES.name: ADMAES
ADMAES.description: ADMA error state (when ADMA error is occurred)

DLY_CELL_SET_POST.name: DLY_CELL_SET_POST
DLY_CELL_SET_POST.description: Delay cells on the feedback clock between CLK_OUT and CLK_POST

DLY_CELL_SET_OUT.name: DLY_CELL_SET_OUT
DLY_CELL_SET_OUT.description: Delay cells on the feedback clock between CLK_PRE and CLK_OUT

DLY_CELL_SET_PRE.name: DLY_CELL_SET_PRE
DLY_CELL_SET_PRE.description: delay cells on the feedback clock between the feedback clock and CLK_PRE

TAP_SEL_POST.name: TAP_SEL_POST
TAP_SEL_POST.description: Delay cells added on the feedback clock between CLK_OUT and CLK_POST

TAP_SEL_OUT.name: TAP_SEL_OUT
TAP_SEL_OUT.description: Delay cells added on the feedback clock between CLK_PRE and CLK_OUT

enumeratedValues.name: VSELECT_B
enumeratedValues.description: Change the voltage to high voltage range, around 3.0 V

enumeratedValues.name: VSELECT_a
enumeratedValues.description: Change the voltage to low voltage range, around 1.8 V

enumeratedValues.name: AC12_WR_CHKBUSY_EN_a
enumeratedValues.description: Do not check busy after auto CMD12 for write data packet

enumeratedValues.name: AC12_WR_CHKBUSY_EN_b
enumeratedValues.description: Check busy after auto CMD12 for write data packet

enumeratedValues.name: FRC_SDCLK_ON_a
enumeratedValues.description: CLK active or inactive is fully controlled by the hardware.

enumeratedValues.name: CRC_CHK_DIS_a
enumeratedValues.description: Check CRC16 for every read data packet and check CRC fields for every write data packet

enumeratedValues.name: CRC_CHK_DIS_B
enumeratedValues.description: Ignore CRC16 check for every read data packet and ignore CRC fields check for every write data packet

BOOT_BLK_CNT.name: BOOT_BLK_CNT
BOOT_BLK_CNT.description: Stop At Block Gap value of automatic mode

enumeratedValues.name: CARD_INT_D3_a
enumeratedValues.description: Check the card interrupt only when DATA3 is high.

enumeratedValues.name: CARD_INT_D3_B
enumeratedValues.description: Check the card interrupt by ignoring the status of DATA3.

enumeratedValues.name: TUNING_CMD_EN_a
enumeratedValues.description: Auto tuning circuit does not check the CMD line.

enumeratedValues.name: TUNING_CMD_EN_B
enumeratedValues.description: Auto tuning circuit checks the CMD line.

enumeratedValues.name: ACMD23_ARGU2_EN_a
enumeratedValues.description: Argument2 register enable for ACMD23 sharing with SDMA system address register. Default is enabled.

DIS_CMD_CHK_FOR_STD_TUNING.name: DIS_CMD_CHK_FOR_STD_TUNING
DIS_CMD_CHK_FOR_STD_TUNING.description: Disable command check for standard tuning

STD_TUNING_EN.name: STD_TUNING_EN
STD_TUNING_EN.description: Standard tuning circuit and procedure enable
